name: Elibean Alliance
declaringWar: We do not wish for it to come to this, but your very existence threatens the safety of our people. Therefore, prepare yourselves for war!
attacked: What did we do to deserve this? Black-heart! I shall not allow you to hurt my people!
defeated: Lilina, everyone... please forgive me... for I have failed you all.
introduction: Greetings! I am Roy of Pherae and I represent Elibe as a whole. I am glad to make your acquaintance.
neutralNo: We kindly refuse your humble offer.
afterPeace: It is great to hear that you seek peace as well. Let us continue this not for ourselves, but for our people, shall we?
tradeRequest: We are interested to have an exchange with you.
uniqueText: +3 Science and +5 Production from Antiquity Sites and extra bonuses from Iron resources. Great Generals appear infrequently, in exchange a hero unit can be built once Steel is discovered.
